name: wishlistx
title: WishlistX
description: Save products from online, create wishlists, share them with friends and earn cashback!
author: antonengelhardt

commands.name: saved-items
commands.title: Saved items
commands.subtitle: View all items
commands.description: View all your favorite items in a grid view

commands.name: add-item
commands.title: Add item
commands.subtitle: Add an item to your wishlist
commands.description: Add an item to your wishlist

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
